request.title: SwitchPort Parcel Schema
request.description: SwitchPort profile parcel schema for POST request

mode.description: Set type of switch port: access/trunk

switchportAccessVlan.description: Set VLAN identifier associated with bridging domain

switchportTrunkAllowedVlans.description: Configure VLAN IDs used with the trunk

switchportTrunkNativeVlan.description: Configure VLAN ID used for native VLAN

controlDirection.description: Set uni or bi directional authorization mode

guestVlan.description: Set vlan to drop non-802.1x enabled clients into if client is not in MAB list

ageTime.description: Set when a MAC table entry ages out (0 to disable, 10-1000000 otherwise)

staticMacAddress.description: Add static MAC address entries for interface

macaddr.description: Set MAC address in xxxx.xxxx.xxxx format

vlan.description: Configure VLAN ID used with the mac and interface

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for Switchport profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
